extendedInfo.description: This application is focused exclusively on LDS (Mormon) General Conference.  Read, listen and watch talks from the last 11 years.Requires an internet connection.

reviews.comment: Ib used to love this app but now it doesn\'t seem to work. When i click on a conference talk, it just says \"page not available\" . Are others having this issue?\tLove it. Would be nice to be able to preset 3-4 talks to listen to when driving. Currently just one at a time. I\'m single so no one to set next talk
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: Love this app. Just waiting now for October 2012 - that would make it a perfect 5-star app! Well, that and the option of watching the entire session or the already provided individual talks. However, the individual talks are just fine :) Thanks for such a great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: The listen button does not work if you like to listen to these in bed. Can you take a look at that? Otherwise, it works
reviews.author: Wendy Weston

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app. Just  wondering if you will be getting the more recent conferences. Also, can the music or talks continue playing to the next one?
reviews.author: Dara Hess

reviews.title: Idea for improvement
reviews.comment: I love this app. It\'s a great way to access previous general conference talks. However, I\'d love a way that I can mark which ones I\'ve read so I know which ones to still read.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Great way to revisit conference talks and relaxing way to go to sleep at night! But I am wondering when it will be updated with talks from October 2012 conference? In the past it seems the would have been there already...
reviews.author: Amy Hunter

reviews.title: 5 stars!
reviews.comment: Even though I can download the conference talks from my scripture app, I like this one the best.  Where else can you choose to either read the text, listen to the audio, or watch the entire video all from one place?  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome, except...
reviews.comment: I can\'t find this in the settings, but it would be great if you could listen to the entire session instead of having to play each individual talk. It used to be possible in other versions, I think. Other than that it\'s terrific! Thanks for making this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stellar app
reviews.comment: Thanks for this brother.  A great service you are providing Ben.
reviews.author: Charlie Crump

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for over a year now and thought it was time to give it 5 stars. The only thing is that I get impatient waiting for the new material after conference because I love this app so much and prefer it to any other way to access conference.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply convenient
reviews.comment: Every way to enjoy gc in a simple and easy to use app.  Thank you for putting this together for us.  My wife was really excited when I loaded it on her phone and told her to try it out.  She\'s not too tech savy, but that was no problem with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Marty
reviews.comment: Always happy with this app, have it not only on my tablet, but also my phone. Waiting anxiously now for the October 2012 Conference now. This app will always be a five star to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Great App. Handy to have on the go. When will it be updated with the October 2012 sessions?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really good
reviews.author: Rich Sefcik

reviews.title: Excellent, simple app
reviews.comment: The easiest app I have found to read, watch, or listen to general conference
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I really like this app, but when will you add the newest conference to it? October 2012
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: October 2012?
reviews.comment: I love this app! Any idea when it will be updated with October 2012?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thank you for making this available!  I use it every day!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updates needed
reviews.comment: Please add fall 2012 and spring 2013! I love this app but can\'t use it much if it\'s not updated.
reviews.author: Jeffrey S Wallace

reviews.title: Marsha
reviews.comment: Love it. Gives me comfort.
reviews.author: A Google User
